metadata.description: A unique, publisher-defined name that identifies this Mona deployment.
This Mona deployment's Azure Active Directory (AAD) tenant ID.
This Mona deployment's Azure Active Directory (AAD) client ID.
This Mona deployment's Azure Active Directory (AAD) enterprise application/principal object ID.
This Mona deployment's Azure Active Directory (AAD) client secret.
If provided, specifies the ID of an existing app service plan that the Mona web app should be deployed to.
The preferred UI language for this Mona deployment.

appDescriptions.onCancelled: This workflow is automatically triggered after Mona has been notified by the AppSource/Marketplace that a subscription has been cancelled.
appDescriptions.onPurchased: This workflow is automatically triggered after a customer has confirmed their AppSource/Marketplace purchase through the Mona landing page.
appDescriptions.onPlanChanged: This workflow is automatically triggered after Mona has been notified by the AppSource/Marketplace that a subscription plan has been changed.
appDescriptions.onSeatQtyChanged: This workflow is automatically triggered after Mona has been notified by the AppSource/Marketplace that a subscription seat quantity has been changed.
appDescriptions.onSuspended: This workflow is automatically triggered after Mona has been notified by the AppSource/Marketplace that a subscription has been suspended.
appDescriptions.onReinstated: This workflow is automatically triggered after Mona has been notified by the AppSource/Marketplace that a subscription has been reinstated.

appNames.onSeatQtyChanged: Cantidad de asientos de suscripción cambiada

appDescriptions.onCancelled: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que AppSource/Marketplace notifique a Mona que se canceló una suscripción.
appDescriptions.onPurchased: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que un cliente haya confirmado su compra de AppSource/Marketplace a través de la página de destino de Mona.
appDescriptions.onPlanChanged: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que AppSource/Marketplace notifique a Mona que se ha cambiado un plan de una suscripción.
appDescriptions.onSeatQtyChanged: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que AppSource/Marketplace notifique a Mona que se ha cambiado la cantidad de asiestos de una suscripción.
appDescriptions.onSuspended: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que AppSource/Marketplace notifique a Mona que se ha suspendido una suscripción.
appDescriptions.onReinstated: Este flujo de trabajo se activa automáticamente después de que AppSource/Marketplace notifique a Mona que se ha reestablecido una suscripción.

beneficiary.aadObjectId: AAD ID de objeto del beneficiario
beneficiary.aadTenantId: AAD Identificador de inquilino del beneficiario

purchaser.aadObjectId: AAD ID de objeto del comprador
purchaser.aadTenantId: AAD Identificador de inquilino del comprador

term.endDate: Fecha de finalización de la suscripción
term.startDate: Fecha de comienzo de la suscripción
